title: I have a new computer account, and I just signed into the Mojang website, but it’s not letting me download the game. It's saying I need to pay for it again. What do I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Did you sign in with the same Mojang account? It sounds to me like you made a new account or used a different one this time. You can use a different account than you use to sign into your computer, that seems to be the issue here.
